LanguageData.OE_ObsidiaColonists.label: obsidia colonists
LanguageData.OE_ObsidiaColonists.description: Your colony is part of the Interplanetary Expansion Program of Obsidia Empire. You have to survive and build a thriving colony with a basic support package.
LanguageData.OE_ObsidiaColonists.scenario.description: Your colony is part of the Interplanetary Expansion Program of Obsidia Empire. You have to survive and build a thriving colony with a basic support package.
LanguageData.OE_ObsidiaColonists.scenario.name: Obsidia colonists
LanguageData.OE_ObsidiaColonists.scenario.summary: A group of Obsidia Empire colonists - the classic Obsidia Expansion experience.
LanguageData.OE_ObsidiaColonists.scenario.parts.GameS: Congratulations! You have become part of the Interplanetary Expansion Program of Obsidia Empire.\n\nIt is time to setting up a farming zone, build residential structures. Construct power sources, defenses and get everything what colony need if you want to make it on this harsh world.
LanguageData.OE_ObsidiaAgent.label: obsidia agent
LanguageData.OE_ObsidiaAgent.description: You're one of the surviving agents after a shipwreck on an unknown planet. You have to survive and create a colony for further implementation your mission.
LanguageData.OE_ObsidiaAgent.scenario.description: You're one of the surviving agents after a shipwreck on an unknown planet. You have to survive and create a colony for further implementation your mission.
LanguageData.OE_ObsidiaAgent.scenario.name: Obsidia agent
LanguageData.OE_ObsidiaAgent.scenario.summary: One of the Obsidia Empire agents - the advanced Obsidia Expansion experience.
LanguageData.OE_ObsidiaAgent.scenario.parts.GameStart:
Mission log #94%#02$-Y3:

Main status: #unknown#

Additional status: shipwreck

Further instructions:

-create a colony

-eliminate #unknown#

-make contacts with #unknown#

-#unknown# survive

-start the Mission #94%80*$-Y4

You are ready?

Y/#unknown#
